[vc_row type=”full-width-section” full_height=”yes” columns_placement=”bottom” equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”bottom” parallax=”tt_parallax” parallax_image=”8155″ overlay=”1″ overlay_color=”rgba(10,10,10,0.3)” el_class=”Header”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1603711987376{border-radius: 10px !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”ABOUT US” font_container=”tag:h1|font_size:58|text_align:center|color:%23ffffff” google_fonts=”font_family:Roboto%3A100%2C100italic%2C300%2C300italic%2Cregular%2Citalic%2C500%2C500italic%2C700%2C700italic%2C900%2C900italic|font_style:700%20bold%20regular%3A700%3Anormal” css=”.vc_custom_1605013735207{padding-top: 100px !important;padding-bottom: 200px !important;background-color: rgba(0,0,0,0.01) !important;*background-color: rgb(0,0,0) !important;}”][vc_row_inner css=”.vc_custom_1603786216707{margin-bottom: -120px !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;}”][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_custom_heading text=”AVS Group” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:44|text_align:center|color:%23002949|line_height:1.2″ google_fonts=”font_family:Poppins%3Aregular|font_style:600%20bold%20regular%3A600%3Anormal” css=”.vc_custom_1605057170872{padding-top: 30px !important;}”]

[vc_custom_heading text=”AVS Group is India based Multinational Company, which deals in numerous fields providing products and solutions. The company has branched itself into various fields. Primarily, we work as a project executor of turnkey projects and international exports.” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:16|text_align:left|color:%23002949″ google_fonts=”font_family:Poppins%3Aregular|font_style:400%20regular%3A400%3Anormal” css=”.vc_custom_1605057631781{padding-right: 10px !important;padding-left: 20px !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”We are a group with social orientation and we shall assist you in all possible manner to boost your businesses in any field which is within our preview.” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:18|text_align:left|color:%23002949″ google_fonts=”font_family:Poppins%3Aregular|font_style:400%20regular%3A400%3Anormal” css=”.vc_custom_1604389636717{padding-right: 10px !important;padding-left: 20px !important;}”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1603788808831{margin-top: 60px !important;margin-right: 40px !important;margin-left: 10px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-right: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;padding-left: 0px !important;background-color: #800080 !important;}”][vc_single_image image=”7969″ img_size=”600*375″ alignment=”center” style=”vc_box_shadow_3d” animation=”rda_fadeIn” css=”.vc_custom_1604042995588{margin-top: 50px !important;margin-right: 40px !important;margin-bottom: 30px !important;margin-left: -20px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-right: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text=”Established in December 19, 2006 under the Companies Act, 1956 (Company Limited by Shares) the company is registered with the Registrar of Companies, Kanpur; the company also possesses ISO 9001-2008 certification” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:18|text_align:left|color:%23002949″ google_fonts=”font_family:Poppins%3Aregular|font_style:400%20regular%3A400%3Anormal” css=”.vc_custom_1604043708483{padding-left: 10px !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”We are a group with social orientation and we shall assist you in all possible manner to boost your businesses in any field which is within our preview. Established in December 19, 2006 under the Companies Act, 1956 (Company Limited by Shares) the company is registered with the Registrar of Companies, Kanpur; the company also possesses ISO 9001-2008 certification” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:18|text_align:left|color:%23002949″ google_fonts=”font_family:Poppins%3Aregular|font_style:400%20regular%3A400%3Anormal” css=”.vc_custom_1604043697078{padding-left: 10px !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”The company is based out of India – a land where the domestic industries of leather and handicrafts have good fame worldwide. Hence, the products of these industries like Leather Shoes, Leather Garments, Leather Articles; Handicrafts items of Marble, Inlay and Carpets, Rugs etc. are being exported worldwide. Export of these items is a major revenue generator, hence promoters have decided to enter into various export businesses.” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:18|text_align:left|color:%23002949″ google_fonts=”font_family:Poppins%3Aregular|font_style:400%20regular%3A400%3Anormal” css=”.vc_custom_1604308469850{padding-left: 10px !important;}”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row parallax_background=”” css=”.vc_custom_1604044372172{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_column][vc_row_inner css=”.vc_custom_1432448207771{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1432448278813{padding-bottom: 45px !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”OUR OBJECTIVES” font_container=”tag:h3|font_size:30|text_align:center|color:%23800080|line_height:24px” google_fonts=”font_family:Raleway%3A100%2C200%2C300%2Cregular%2C500%2C600%2C700%2C800%2C900|font_style:900%20bold%20regular%3A900%3Anormal” el_class=”text_uppercase letterspacing-1-5″ css=”.vc_custom_1604062441621{margin-bottom: 4px !important;padding-bottom: 10px !important;}”]

Executing international projects, exports, imports, and to act as dealers, vendors, authorized dealers for different commodities in both international and domestic trade.

Manufacturing of specialized Vehicles including Fire Fighting and Rescue Vehicles and Fuel Refillers of various capacities.

Manufacturing of all leather products through its subsidiaries or sister concerned.

To carry on the business of buying, selling, import, export of merchandise, to take government-to-government contracts, and to do trading in different types of commodities.

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1432448283497{padding-bottom: 45px !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”OUR STRENGTHS” font_container=”tag:h3|font_size:30|text_align:center|color:%23800080|line_height:24px” google_fonts=”font_family:Raleway%3A100%2C200%2C300%2Cregular%2C500%2C600%2C700%2C800%2C900|font_style:900%20bold%20regular%3A900%3Anormal” el_class=”text_uppercase letterspacing-1-5″ css=”.vc_custom_1604062452962{margin-bottom: 4px !important;padding-bottom: 10px !important;}”]

Professionalism in planning, manufacturing and execution process of all varieties of businesses we deal in.

Reliability in quality from selecting materials, workforce, technology and equipment to choose, through overall premium craftsmanship standard.

On-time Delivery is of the utmost importance to us.

[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1432448278813{padding-bottom: 45px !important;}”]
